references: H. Hasse, Number Theory, Springer-Verlag, NY, 1980, p. 498.
N. J. A. Sloane and Simon Plouffe, The Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences, Academic Press, 1995 (includes this sequence).
links: Vincenzo Librandi, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..5000
prog: (PARI) {a(n) = local( cnt, m ); if( n<1, return( 0 )); while( cnt < n, if( isprime( m++) && kronecker( -20, m )==-1, cnt++ )); m} /* _Michael Somos_, Aug 14 2012 */
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_, _Mira Bernstein_
